item.title: Notes from reading 'PEAK: Secrets from the New Science of Expertise'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: The core elements of deliberate practice include focus, feedback and fix, stepping out of the comfort zone, extensive training, and mentorship.

item.title: Notes from reading 'The Willpower Instinct'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: The lack of self-control is not only a psychological problem, but also influenced by physiology, psychological traps and various social factors.
